const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      mode: "synthetic",
    },
    properties: {
      agg_metric: {
        type: "aggregate_metric_double",
        metrics: ["min", "max", "sum", "value_count"],
        default_metric: "max",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    agg_metric: {
      min: -302.5,
      max: 702.3,
      sum: 200,
      value_count: 25,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
